timeline.bodyText: Were the bulk loading options a public interface? It doesn't seem like ignoring them would be a "breakage", so I don't think it hinders the removal, but it does seem worth documenting, and maybe trying to detect and warn?
timeline.author: vvcephei

replies.bodyText: Bulk loading was not a public interface, however we did have documents before about compounding listener and callback. Thinking about this, I will add a warn when detected that the registered callback is also a listener.
replies.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText: Sounds good. I was thrown off by userSpecifiedOptions.prepareForBulkLoad() because it looks like the user could have specified some bulk loading options, but I took another look, and I see that that's just the variable name. The actual method is internal, and there's no way to configure bulk-loading options specifically as a user. So, I'm satisfied. Thanks!
